Interface IModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractModel, PerfectModel, RoomModel, WrappingModel

    public interface IModel
    The interface of Maze.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • buildMaze

        boolean buildMaze()
        Build the cells, walls of the maze and set the golds and thieves. Use Union-Find to remove walls/add connections which guarantee that the player can reach any of the cell.
        Returns:
        true: build successfully; false: build unsuccessfully

      • getHistory

        java.lang.String getHistory()
        Get the movement history of the player.
        Returns:
        The history in String

      • move

        void move(Direction d)
        The player move to the next cell and the movement direction is d.
        Parameters:
        d - the direction of the movement, it can be either EAST, WEST, NORTH, SOUTH

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        Print the maze in string including cells and walls.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the maze

      • getMessage

        java.lang.String getMessage()
        Get the player's current state.
        Returns:
        current state

      • shoot

        void shoot(Direction d,
           int numOfCaves)
        Make a shot.
        Parameters:
        numOfCaves - the distance of the shoot

      • gameEnd

        boolean gameEnd()
        Check if the game is end.
        Returns:
